params.approved: Whether the spender is approved to spend tokens from the vault or not
params.spender: Address that is approved to spend tokens from the vault

claimOwnership().details: This function is only callable by the `_pendingOwner`.

decreaseERC20Allowance(address,address,u.details: Only callable by the owner or asset manager.Current allowance should be computed off-chain to avoid any underflow.

params._amount: Amount of tokens to decrease allowance by
params._spender: Address of the spender of the tokens
params._token: Address of the ERC20 token to decrease allowance for

increaseERC20Allowance(address,address,u.details: Only callable by the owner or asset manager.Allowance can only be increased for approved `spender` addresses.Current allowance should be computed off-chain to avoid any overflow.

params._amount: Amount of tokens to increase allowance by
params._spender: Address of the spender of the tokens
params._token: Address of the ERC20 token to increase allowance for

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._spender: Address that will spend the tokens

setManager(address).details: Throws if called by any account other than the owner.

returns._0: Boolean to indicate if the operation was successful or not.

Approved(address,bool).notice: Emitted when a `spender` address is approved to spend tokens from the vault.

approved(address).notice: Tracks addresses approved to spend tokens from the vault.

claimOwnership().notice: Allows the `_pendingOwner` address to finalize the transfer.

decreaseERC20Allowance(address,address,u.notice: Decrease allowance of ERC20 tokens held by this contract.

increaseERC20Allowance(address,address,u.notice: Increase allowance of ERC20 tokens held by this contract.

owner().notice: Returns the address of the current owner.

setApproval(address,bool).notice: Approves the given `spender` address to spend ERC20 tokens from the vault.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows current owner to set the `_pendingOwner` address.

userdoc.notice: The TokenVault contract stores ERC20 tokens that are swapped through the PrizePoolLiquidator contract.         Stakers are then able to claim their share of rewards by interacting with the GaugeReward contract.         Rewards are then transferred directly from the TokenVault to the staker account.
